tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NutritionPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  dietary_restrictions TEXT,
  dietary_preferences TEXT,
  performance_goals TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (
    athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    weight INT,
    dietary_restrictions TEXT[],
    performance_goals TEXT[],
    preferences TEXT[]
);

CREATE TABLE nutrition_plans (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id UUID REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id),
    plan_name TEXT,
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fats INT
);

CREATE TABLE NutritionPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  dietary_restrictions TEXT,
  preferences TEXT,
  performance_goals TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT,
  height DECIMAL,
  weight DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Meals (
  meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meal_name TEXT,
  calories INT,
  protein_grams DECIMAL,
  carbs_grams DECIMAL,
  fat_grams DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50),
    dietary_restrictions TEXT,
    performance_goals TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE NutritionPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    plan_description TEXT,
    plan_calories INT,
    athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DietaryRestrictions (
    restriction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restriction_name VARCHAR(50),
    restriction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_description TEXT,
    athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE NutritionPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fats INT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceGoals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
    goal_type VARCHAR(50),
    target_value FLOAT,
    current_value FLOAT
);
